descriptionHtml:

And this Status Saver for Whatsapp also display downloaded videos and images separately. User can easily find old download files using this best status saver for whatsapp. Also allow to watch saved videos offline and helpfull for download WhatsApp Status. This free status saver app can easily download your WhatsApp Statuses and also allow to share with others.

Just download this Status Downloader App and view friends status at any time.

📌How to use Status Saver for WhatsApp & Status Downloader ?

2. Here in 'Live Status' you can easily watch videos and images status
3. Click Download button and save them

5. Open 'Gallery' activity and view downloaded files of status saver app
